title: DJ Sona Request
body:
Can we have DJ sona set so that if we opt into the music, it actually comes with volume WITHOUT having to change settings.

I have the normal league music set to 0, and have to change it based on whether or not there is a DJ sona on my team (i'm aware it's mostly cause hype it changes so often but still)

replies.body: dj songs songs suck i just mute her. it would be dope if we could put in our own music and set them as the tunes instead
You probably could do that. BUT, I always just have MusicBee playing %%%% in the background when I play League anyway. You know, for more than three songs.
